items.title: Basic Attack: Kazahana
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:\nUnleashes up to five slashes ahead, the first two deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, and the last three deal <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.\nBlock enemy attacks during the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

items.title: Basic Attack: Shimotsuki
items.text:
With at least 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Hoshimi Miyabi sheaths her blade, enters <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> and starts to charge up. Every level of charge will consume 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>, up to a maximum of three levels of charge.
When releasing <IconMap:Icon_Normal>, or when <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> is completely depleted, Hoshimi Miyabi will draw her blade and unleash a powerful slash ahead based on the current charge level, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>. She then exits <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>.
Character is invulnerable during <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>.
Hoshimi Miyabi can have up to 6 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. Upon entering the battlefield, Hoshimi Miyabi immediately obtains 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.

items.title: Special Attack: Miyuki
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:\nQuickly draws her blade and slashes ahead, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.\nAnti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

items.title: EX Special Attack: Hisetsu
items.text:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Rush forward, unleashing powerful slashes against enemies along the way, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, with enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> again to activate:
Consume extra Energy and unleash a powerful follow-up attack against enemies in front, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Dodge: Mizutori
items.text:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
While dodging, repeatedly press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A dash dodge that covers a lot of ground.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Dash Attack: Fuyubachi
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:\nSlashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

items.title: Dodge Counter: Kan Suzume
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:\nSlashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Chain Attack: Spring's Call
items.text: When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:\nUnleashes a powerful slash at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Ultimate: Lingering Snow
items.text:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes powerful slashes at enemies ahead in a large area then pauses, before unleashing a Finishing Move, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and increase <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> by 30% for 12s.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Core Passive: Searing Cold
items.text: When Hoshimi Miyabi deals <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>, she applies <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to the target, lasting 30s. When accumulating <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</color> against targets with <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color>, increases <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> by 100% of Hoshimi Miyabi's CRIT Rate, up to a maximum increase of 80%. As Hoshimi Miyabi accumulates <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</color>, it has its own independent Attribute Anomaly Buildup gauge and triggers <color=#98EFF0>Freeze</color>, <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color>, and <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> that can react with other Attribute Anomalies, including <color=#98EFF0>Ice Attribute Anomaly</color>, to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>.\nWhen Hoshimi Miyabi applies <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> to enemies with <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color>, it will consume the <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>750%</color> of Hoshimi Miyabi's ATK and causing the target to enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state. All units accumulate <color=#2BAD00>14%</color> more Anomaly Buildup against enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state, but Hoshimi Miyabi cannot reapply <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to these enemies. The <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state ends when <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> expires. While this state remains active, triggering another Attribute Anomaly will overwrite <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> and remove <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color>.\nUpon triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. This effect can trigger once every 10s.

items.title: Additional Ability: Bask in Frost
items.text: When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character or shares the same Faction:\n<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> DMG increases by 60%. When any squad member triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> during the next <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> will ignore 30% of the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color>.

items.title: Quick Assist: Dancing Petals
items.text: When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:\nSlashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Defensive Assist: Drifting Petals
items.text: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:\nParries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Assist Follow-Up: Falling Petals
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:\nCharges and slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

ranks.name: Frost Atop the Snow
ranks.desc: While in <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>, every 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> consumed will allow <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> to ignore 6% of DEF, stacking up to 6 times and lasting until <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> ends.\nWhen the slash for charge level three of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> hits an enemy under <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color>, it will immediately remove the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state and increase all squad members' Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20% for 10s.

ranks.name: Breath Technique
ranks.desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Kazahana</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 30%.\nHoshimi Miyabi gains 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> when the final move of the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Kazahana</color> hits an enemy.\nUpon entering the battlefield, Hoshimi Miyabi immediately obtains 6 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and her CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

ranks.name: Rupture
ranks.desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color> DMG increases by 30%. Upon triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi generates 250 more Decibels.

ranks.name: Prodigious Talent
ranks.desc: During <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains <color=#FFFFFF>Polar</color>, which increases <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> DMG by 30%. After obtaining <color=#FFFFFF>Polar</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi will automatically draw her blade and unleash powerful slashes based on the current charge level upon consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. Before <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> is completely depleted, the draw and slashes will not interrupt charging under <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>. Each occurrence of <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> can perform up to 3 draws and slashes.
